title: IPL 2025 auction: Complete squads of all ten teams
description: The 2025 IPL auction drew to a close in Saudi Arabia today (November 25). Here's how all teams stand at the end of the auction.
author: Katya Witney
excerpt: The 2025 IPL auction drew to a close in Saudi Arabia today (November 25). Here's how all teams stand at the end of the auction.
text: The 2025 IPL auction drew to a close in Saudi Arabia today (November 25). Here's how all teams stand at the end of the auction. The squads are now finalised for the 2025 edition of the IPL, with plenty of action across the two days of the auction. Rishabh Pant and Shreyas Iyer attracted record bids on day one, the former surpassing the latter's record of 26.75 crore when he was sold to LSG for 27 crore. Those records both surpassed the record bid for Mitchell Starc at last year's auction (24.75 crore). Jos Buttler also attracted a sizable bid of 15.75 crore, which saw him sold to Gujarat Titans. Buttler was let go from his long term franchise Rajasthan Royals ahead of the auction, and while the Royals attempted to bid for him back, they were unable to match Gujarat's winning offer. IPL 2025 auction: As it happened Another notable moment was when Venkatesh Iyer was sold to KKR for 23.75 crore after a fierce bidding war with RCB, who had blown much of their budget on their retained players. KKR also picked up the South Africa pair of Quinton de Kock and Anrich Norjte. Bhuvneshwar Kumar was the most expensive pick on day two, going to RCB for 10.75 crore. With all the bidding now done, teams can start to finalise their plans for the competition next year. Full list: Complete squads of all ten IPL 2025 teams Chennai Super Kings Retained players: Ravindra Jadeja, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Matheesha Pathirana, Shivam Dube, MS Dhoni Purchased players: Noor Ahmed*, R Ashwin, Devon Conway*, Khaleel Ahmed, Rachin Ravindra*, Rahul Tripathi, Anshul Kamboj, Sam Curran*, Gurjapneet Singh, Nathan Ellis*, Deepak Hooda, Jamie Overton*, Vijay Shankar, Vansh Bedi, Shreyas Gopal, C Andre Siddarth, Ramakrishna Ghosh, Shaik Rasheed, Mukesh Choudhary, Kamlesh Nagarkoti. Delhi Capitals Retained players: Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Tristan Stubbs*, Abishek Porel. Purchased players: KL Rahul, Mitchell Starc*, T Natarajan, Jake Fraser-McGurk*, Mukesh Kumar, Harry Brook*, Ashutosh Sharma, Mohit Sharma, Faf du Plessis*, Sameer Rizvi, Donavan Ferreira*, Dushmantha Chameera*, Vipraj Nigam, Manvanth Kumar, Darshan Nalkande, AJ Mandal, Tripurana Vijay, Madhav Tiwari. Gujarat Titans Retained players: Rashid Khan*, Shubman Gill, Sai Sudharsan, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia. Purchased players: Jos Buttler*, Mohammed Siraj, Kagiso Rabada*, Prasidh Krishna, Washington Sundar, Sherfane Rutherford*, Gerald Coetzee*, Glenn Phillips*, Sai Kishore, Mahipal Lomror, Gurnoor Brar, Arshad Khan, Karim Janat*, Jayant Yadav, Ishant Sharma, Kumar Kushagra, Nishant Sindhu, Manav Suthar, Anuj Rawat, Kulwant Khejroliya. Kolkata Knight Riders Retained players: Rinku Singh, Varun Chakravarthy, Andre Russell*, Sunil Narine*, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh. Purchased players: Venkatesh Iyer, Anrich Nortje*, Quinton de Kock*, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Spencer Johnson*, Rahmanullah Gurbaz*, Moeen Ali*, Vaibhav Arora, Rovman Powell*, Ajinkya Rahane, Umran Malik, Manish Pandey, Anukul Roy, Luvnith Sisodia, Mayank Markande. Lucknow Super Giants Retained players: Nicholas Pooran*, Mayank Yadav, Ravi Bishnoi, Ayush Badoni, Mohsin Khan. Purchased players: Rishabh Pant, Avesh Khan, Akash Deep, David Miller*, Abdul Samad, Mitchell Marsh*, Shahbaz Ahmed, Aiden Markram*, Matthew Breetzke*, Shamar Joseph*, Manimaran Siddharth, Himmat Singh, Arshin Kulkarni, Digvesh Singh, Prince Yadav, Yuvraj Chaudhary, Akash Singh, Rajvardhan Hangargekar, Aryan Juyal. Mumbai Indians Retained players: Jasprit Bumrah, Hardik Pandya, Suryakumar Yadav, Rohit Sharma, Tilak Varma Purchased players: Trent Boult*, Deepak Chahar, Naman Dhir, Will Jacks*, AM Ghazanfar*, Mitchell Santner*, Ryan Rickelton*, Reece Topley*, Robin Minz, Karn Sharma, Bevon Jacobs*, Ashwani Kumar, Krishnan Shrijith, Arjun Tendulkar, Lizaad Williams*, Vignesh Puthur. Punjab Kings Retained players: Shashank Singh, Prabhsimran Singh. Purchased players: Shreyas Iyer, Arshdeep Singh, Yuzvendra Chahal, Marcus Stoinis*, Marco Jansen*, Nehal Wadhera, Glenn Maxwell*, Harnoor Singh, Harpreet Brar, Priyansh Arya, Josh Inglis*, Kuldeep Sen Azmatullah Omarzai*, Lockie Ferguson*, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Yash Thakur, Aaron Hardie*, Vishnu Vinod, Xavier Bartlett*, Suryansh Shedge, Pyla Avinash, Musheer Khan, Praveen Dubey. Rajasthan Royals Retained players: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Dhruv Jurel, Riyan Parag, Shimron Hetmyer*, Sandeep Sharma Purchased players: Jofra Archer*, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga*, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Fazalhaq Farooqi*, Kwena Maphaka*, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kumar Karikeya, Kunal Rathore, Ashok Sharma. Royal Challengers Bengaluru Retained players: Virat Kohli, Rajit Patidar, Yash Dayal. Purchased players: Josh Hazlewood*, Phil Salt*, Jitesh Sharma, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Liam Livingstone*, Rasikh Salam, Krunal Pandya, Tim David*, Suyash Sharma, Jacob Bethell*, Devdutt Padikkal, Nuwan Thushara*, Romario Shepherd*, Swapnil Singh, Swastik Chikara, Manoj Bhandage, Abhinandan Singh, Lungi Ngidi*, Mohit Rathee. Sunrisers Hyderabad Retained players: Heinrich Klaasen*, Pat Cummins*, Abhishek Sharma, Travis Head*, Nitish Kumar Reddy. Purchased players: Ishan Kishan, Mohammed Shami, Harshal Patel, Rahul Chahar, Abhinav Manohar, Adam Zampa*, Simarjeet Singh, Eshan Malinga*, Brydon Carse*, Jaydev Unadkat, Kamindu Mendis*, Zeeshan Ansari, Aniket Verma, Atharva Taide, Sachin Baby. html:
The 2025 IPL auction drew to a close in Saudi Arabia today (November 25). Here's how all teams stand at the end of the auction.

The squads are now finalised for the 2025 edition of the IPL, with plenty of action across the two days of the auction. Rishabh Pant and Shreyas Iyer attracted record bids on day one, the former surpassing the latter's record of 26.75 crore when he was sold to LSG for 27 crore. Those records both surpassed the record bid for Mitchell Starc at last year's auction (24.75 crore).

Jos Buttler also attracted a sizable bid of 15.75 crore, which saw him sold to Gujarat Titans. Buttler was let go from his long term franchise Rajasthan Royals ahead of the auction, and while the Royals attempted to bid for him back, they were unable to match Gujarat's winning offer.

IPL 2025 auction: As it happened

Another notable moment was when Venkatesh Iyer was sold to KKR for 23.75 crore after a fierce bidding war with RCB, who had blown much of their budget on their retained players. KKR also picked up the South Africa pair of Quinton de Kock and Anrich Norjte.

Bhuvneshwar Kumar was the most expensive pick on day two, going to RCB for 10.75 crore. With all the bidding now done, teams can start to finalise their plans for the competition next year.

Full list: Complete squads of all ten IPL 2025 teams

Chennai Super Kings

Retained players: Ravindra Jadeja, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Matheesha Pathirana, Shivam Dube, MS Dhoni

Purchased players: Noor Ahmed*, R Ashwin, Devon Conway*, Khaleel Ahmed, Rachin Ravindra*, Rahul Tripathi, Anshul Kamboj, Sam Curran*, Gurjapneet Singh, Nathan Ellis*, Deepak Hooda, Jamie Overton*, Vijay Shankar, Vansh Bedi, Shreyas Gopal, C Andre Siddarth, Ramakrishna Ghosh, Shaik Rasheed, Mukesh Choudhary, Kamlesh Nagarkoti.

Delhi Capitals

Retained players: Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Tristan Stubbs*, Abishek Porel.

Purchased players: KL Rahul, Mitchell Starc*, T Natarajan, Jake Fraser-McGurk*, Mukesh Kumar, Harry Brook*, Ashutosh Sharma, Mohit Sharma, Faf du Plessis*, Sameer Rizvi, Donavan Ferreira*, Dushmantha Chameera*, Vipraj Nigam, Manvanth Kumar, Darshan Nalkande, AJ Mandal, Tripurana Vijay, Madhav Tiwari.

Gujarat Titans

Retained players: Rashid Khan*, Shubman Gill, Sai Sudharsan, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia.

Purchased players: Jos Buttler*, Mohammed Siraj, Kagiso Rabada*, Prasidh Krishna, Washington Sundar, Sherfane Rutherford*, Gerald Coetzee*, Glenn Phillips*, Sai Kishore, Mahipal Lomror, Gurnoor Brar, Arshad Khan, Karim Janat*, Jayant Yadav, Ishant Sharma, Kumar Kushagra, Nishant Sindhu, Manav Suthar, Anuj Rawat, Kulwant Khejroliya.

Kolkata Knight Riders

Retained players: Rinku Singh, Varun Chakravarthy, Andre Russell*, Sunil Narine*, Harshit Rana, Ramandeep Singh.

Purchased players: Venkatesh Iyer, Anrich Nortje*, Quinton de Kock*, Angkrish Raghuvanshi, Spencer Johnson*, Rahmanullah Gurbaz*, Moeen Ali*, Vaibhav Arora, Rovman Powell*, Ajinkya Rahane, Umran Malik, Manish Pandey, Anukul Roy, Luvnith Sisodia, Mayank Markande.

Lucknow Super Giants

Retained players: Nicholas Pooran*, Mayank Yadav, Ravi Bishnoi, Ayush Badoni, Mohsin Khan.

Purchased players: Rishabh Pant, Avesh Khan, Akash Deep, David Miller*, Abdul Samad, Mitchell Marsh*, Shahbaz Ahmed, Aiden Markram*, Matthew Breetzke*, Shamar Joseph*, Manimaran Siddharth, Himmat Singh, Arshin Kulkarni, Digvesh Singh, Prince Yadav, Yuvraj Chaudhary, Akash Singh, Rajvardhan Hangargekar, Aryan Juyal.

Mumbai Indians

Retained players: Jasprit Bumrah, Hardik Pandya, Suryakumar Yadav, Rohit Sharma, Tilak Varma

Purchased players: Trent Boult*, Deepak Chahar, Naman Dhir, Will Jacks*, AM Ghazanfar*, Mitchell Santner*, Ryan Rickelton*, Reece Topley*, Robin Minz, Karn Sharma, Bevon Jacobs*, Ashwani Kumar, Krishnan Shrijith, Arjun Tendulkar, Lizaad Williams*, Vignesh Puthur.

Punjab Kings

Retained players: Shashank Singh, Prabhsimran Singh.

Purchased players: Shreyas Iyer, Arshdeep Singh, Yuzvendra Chahal, Marcus Stoinis*, Marco Jansen*, Nehal Wadhera, Glenn Maxwell*, Harnoor Singh, Harpreet Brar, Priyansh Arya, Josh Inglis*, Kuldeep Sen Azmatullah Omarzai*, Lockie Ferguson*, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Yash Thakur, Aaron Hardie*, Vishnu Vinod, Xavier Bartlett*, Suryansh Shedge, Pyla Avinash, Musheer Khan, Praveen Dubey.

Rajasthan Royals

Retained players: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Dhruv Jurel, Riyan Parag, Shimron Hetmyer*, Sandeep Sharma

Purchased players: Jofra Archer*, Tushar Deshpande, Wanindu Hasaranga*, Maheesh Theekshana, Nitish Rana, Fazalhaq Farooqi*, Kwena Maphaka*, Akash Madhwal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Shubham Dubey, Yudhvir Singh, Kumar Karikeya, Kunal Rathore, Ashok Sharma.

Royal Challengers Bengaluru

Retained players: Virat Kohli, Rajit Patidar, Yash Dayal.

Purchased players: Josh Hazlewood*, Phil Salt*, Jitesh Sharma, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Liam Livingstone*, Rasikh Salam, Krunal Pandya, Tim David*, Suyash Sharma, Jacob Bethell*, Devdutt Padikkal, Nuwan Thushara*, Romario Shepherd*, Swapnil Singh, Swastik Chikara, Manoj Bhandage, Abhinandan Singh, Lungi Ngidi*, Mohit Rathee.

Sunrisers Hyderabad

Retained players: Heinrich Klaasen*, Pat Cummins*, Abhishek Sharma, Travis Head*, Nitish Kumar Reddy.

Purchased players: Ishan Kishan, Mohammed Shami, Harshal Patel, Rahul Chahar, Abhinav Manohar, Adam Zampa*, Simarjeet Singh, Eshan Malinga*, Brydon Carse*, Jaydev Unadkat, Kamindu Mendis*, Zeeshan Ansari, Aniket Verma, Atharva Taide, Sachin Baby.
